# Magic Castle / EESSI modules required for building the MPI+OpenMP stencil
EESSI/2023.12
foss/2023b               # GCC 13.2.0 + OpenMPI 4.1.6 + OpenBLAS 0.3.24
perf/6.6                 # Kernel perf for on-node profiling
likwid/5.2.2             # Optional hardware counter profiling (if installed)
